name: Found Money!
description: You spot something on the ground... is that money?

0.name: Lucky find
0.description: It's a $20 bill! You pocket it with a smile. Today is your lucky day!

1.name: Small change
1.description: Just a few coins totaling $2. Better than nothing!

2.name: False alarm
2.description: It's just a crumpled receipt. Oh well.

name: Vending Machine Glitch
description: The vending machine makes a strange noise after you walk past...

0.name: Free snacks!
0.description: Multiple items fall out! You grab them before anyone notices. Free snacks worth about $8!

1.name: One freebie
1.description: A single candy bar drops out. Score!

2.name: Nothing happens
2.description: False alarm - the machine just made a weird sound.

name: Parking Ticket
description: A parking officer is writing something near your car...

0.name: Full ticket
0.description: You got a $75 parking ticket. You were only 5 minutes over!

1.name: Warning only
1.description: Just a warning this time. The officer lets you off with a stern look.

2.name: Wrong car
2.description: They were ticketing the car next to yours. Phew!

name: Street Performer
description: A talented street performer catches your attention with an amazing show.

0.name: Generous mood
0.description: Feeling generous, you toss $10 in their hat. They dedicate their next song to you!

2.name: Just watching
2.description: You enjoy the show but move on without tipping. Entertainment was free!

name: Dropped Wallet
description: Someone ahead of you drops their wallet without noticing!

0.name: Rewarded
0.description: You return it and the grateful owner gives you $30 as a thank you!

1.name: Simple thanks
1.description: You return it and receive a heartfelt thank you. Good deed done!

2.name: Suspicious reaction
2.description: The owner accuses you of stealing it! After clearing things up, you walk away frustrated.

name: Coffee Shop Surprise
description: The person ahead of you in the coffee line turns around...

0.name: Pay it forward
0.description: They paid for your coffee! A random act of kindness saves you $6.

1.name: Old acquaintance
1.description: It's someone you vaguely know. Awkward small talk ensues.

2.name: Wrong person
2.description: They thought you were someone else. Awkward!

name: Scratch Card
description: You find a scratch card on the ground. Someone must have dropped it!

0.name: Big winner!
0.description: You scratch it and... $50 WINNER! What luck!

1.name: Small prize
1.description: You won $5! Not bad for a free ticket.

2.name: Already scratched
2.description: Oh... it was already scratched. And it's a loser.

name: Broken ATM
description: You walk past an ATM that's making strange beeping noises...

0.name: Cash dispensed!
0.description: $40 pops out of the machine! No one's around... finder's keepers?

1.name: Out of order
1.description: The machine displays 'OUT OF ORDER'. Nothing interesting here.

2.name: Eats your card
2.description: You try to use it and it eats your card! You'll need to pay $15 for a replacement.

name: Crowded Subway
description: The subway is packed today. You squeeze in as the doors close.

0.name: Pickpocketed!
0.description: Someone swiped $25 from your pocket in the crowd! You don't notice until later.

2.name: Found cash
2.description: You spot a $10 bill on the floor that someone dropped. Score!

0.name: Direct hit
0.description: The pigeon... does what pigeons do. Dry cleaning will cost you $20.

1.name: Near miss
1.description: It flies right past you. That was close!

2.name: Lucky charm
2.description: They say bird droppings bring luck... you find $15 on the ground moments later!

name: Food Truck Freebie
description: A food truck is giving out samples today!

0.name: Full meal!
0.description: They're feeling generous - you get a full portion worth $12!

1.name: Tasty sample
1.description: A delicious bite-sized sample. It was good but now you're hungry...

2.name: Sold out
2.description: The line was too long and they ran out before you got there.

0.name: Caught unprepared
0.description: You're soaked! A nearby store sells you an umbrella for $15.

1.name: Found shelter
1.description: You duck under an awning just in time. Crisis averted!

2.name: Kind stranger
2.description: Someone shares their umbrella with you. Faith in humanity restored!

name: Store Promotion
description: A store employee approaches you with a survey...

0.name: Gift card winner
0.description: You're the 100th customer! Here's a $25 gift card!

1.name: Small discount
1.description: For completing the survey, you get a $5 coupon.

2.name: Time wasted
2.description: After a long survey, you just get a 'thank you'. What a waste of time.

name: Phone Trouble
description: Your phone buzzes with an unexpected notification...

0.name: Subscription charge
0.description: An app you forgot about charged you $10 for renewal!

1.name: Cashback reward
1.description: Your bank app says you earned $8 in cashback rewards!

2.name: Just spam
2.description: Another promotional email. You swipe it away.

name: Sidewalk Sale
description: You stumble upon a spontaneous sidewalk sale!

0.name: Great bargain
0.description: You find something you needed for only $5 - it normally costs $20!

1.name: Impulse buy
1.description: You buy something you don't really need for $12. Why did you do that?

2.name: Nothing good
2.description: You browse but nothing catches your eye. You move on.
